INSERT INTO bookings(no, user_no, poom_no, start_day, end_day, pet_cnt, request, user_state, host_state, regdate) VALUES(#{no}, #{userNo}, #{poomNo}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{petCnt}, #{request}, 'D', 'D', systimestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET user_state = 'F', host_state = 'F' WHERE user_state = 'D' AND host_state = 'D' AND no = #{no} AND sysdate - CAST(end_day as DATE) > (SELECT check_out/24 FROM bookings b, pooms p WHERE b.poom_no = p.no AND b.no = #{no})
mapper.select: SELECT no, userNo, poomNo, startDay, endDay, petCnt, userState, hostState, mainAddress, subAddress, price, speciesName, poomType, img,poomTitle, r as "rowNum" FROM (SELECT no, userNo, poomNo, startDay, endDay, petCnt, userState, hostState, mainAddress, subAddress, price, speciesName, poomType, img,poomTitle, rownum r FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.user_no userNo, b.poom_no poomNo, b.start_day startDay, b.end_day endDay, b.pet_cnt petCnt, b.user_state userState, b.host_state hostState, p.main_address mainAddress, p.sub_address subAddress, p.price price, s.name speciesName, p.type poomType, pt.img img, p.title poomTitle FROM bookings b, pooms p, species s, photos pt WHERE b.poom_no = p.no AND p.species_no = s.no AND p.no = pt.content_no AND pt.type = 'M' AND b.user_no = #{no} ORDER BY b.no DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
